text: André Arthur (December 21, 1943 – May 8, 2022) was a Canadian radio host and politician. He was the independent Member of Parliament for the riding of Portneuf—Jacques-Cartier from 2006 to 2011. Arthur died on May 8, 2022 at the age of 78.Décès de l'animateur polémique André Arthur ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Canadian journalists Category:Canadian radio personalities Category:Politicians from Quebec City
title: André Arthur
